show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Free Speech on Campus
content: Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips are joined by Atilla Nagy, organizer for the Petaluma Progressive Festival being held… this Sunday in northern CA; Will Creeley, Director of Legal and Public Advocacy, Foundation for Individual Rights in Education (FIRE), as he discusses their updated release of Guide to Free Speech on Campus; Steve Zeltzer of Work Week Radio reports on labor issues at the bottom of the hour, and the show rounds out with investigative journalist Danny Weil on the war on critical thinking in the Texas GOP platform, the attack on public education, and more.  We hope you can join us!  http://kpfa.org
